alert.note: Alert for Forrest (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 26 at 9:03PM CDT until August 28 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. Leaf River At Hattiesburg affecting Forrest County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf River At Hattiesburg. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Water begins to cover road at a trailer park about 3 miles downstream of the Highway 11 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Leaf River Hattiesbur 22.0 20.5 Fri 8 pm CDT 21.5 18.7 15.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning around 800 AM CDT.
